body: Superb stuff. Cute, hilarious and heartwarming. I was wondering when the female love rival would appear. It’s literally the final chapter haha. Amazing how the author managed to improve from the first chapter to the latest chapters in terms of story. All the characters were likeable too. Takeda become awesome. And that scene where MC hugs him from behind and tells him he’ll comfort him was golden lol.
i noticed some stories from Mou Manzoku Desho!? | Are You Satisfied Now!?  cross over with Yanagida-kun to Mizuno-san and vice versa like the milk one ;D
lol she was already wet for him before they became "sex friends" haha
Finally found this gem after like 8 years. Please read it.

This is like... one the best things I've read!!! Love some vanilla? Love some comedy? Love some (actual) good plot? Put them all on a blender, and you'll get this shit right here! This is a fuckin masterpiece! And then there's volume 2!
